name: Mathematics
description: Within Natural Sciences, Mathematics and Statistics, Mathematics is the study of abstract deductive systems. It includes topics such as quantity (number theory), structure (algebra), space (geometry), and change (analysis).

name: Algebra
description: A branch of mathematics dealing with symbols and the rules for manipulating those symbols; it is a unifying thread of almost all of mathematics.

name: Geometry
description: A branch of mathematics concerned with properties of space such as the distance, shape, size, and relative position of figures.

name: Numerical analysis
description: The study of algorithms that use numerical approximation (as opposed to symbolic manipulations) for the problems of mathematical analysis.

name: Operational research
description: A discipline that deals with the application of advanced analytical methods to help make better decisions, often using mathematical modeling and optimization.
